values: Whose Son Is the Messiah? King David and the God of IsraelWhose Son Is the Messiah? King David and the God of Israel

When Jesus asks the Pharisees how David calls the Messiah “Lord,” they refuse to answer. What made that seemingly simple question so incendiary?When Jesus asks the Pharisees how David calls the Messiah “Lord,” they refuse to answer. What made that seemingly simple question so incendiary?
